:::::{.code-proj-desc}

### Description
 I realized after recent political events that I was afraid to consider a perspective opposite from my views and beliefs. In this project, I researched the impacts of shifting perspectives and used optical illusions to forcibly change not only my own, but guide the audience to do so as well.
